column2: Do we ascend towards the heaven, or rise before the fall?
It's like a road trip! Do we have a radio in here?
I can just make out the shape of a flagship in the sky!
The window seems jammed. Unless I shoot through it, we're unarmed in here.
The oxygen levels outside are dropping considerably.
Might as well kick our feet up until we can run over some jellies!
There's no rations in here... if it's a long trip, well,,, We'll have to find an alternative.
I should be the one driving this.
Maybe we can put it on autodrive to get a few moments to rest.
